item.title: Israel and Hamas agree first phase of Gaza ceasefire deal
item.description: The deal will see the release of hostages held in Gaza in exchange for Palestinian prisoners and raises hopes for peace after two years of war.

item.title: Thirteen killed as hospital shelled in besieged Sudan city, BBC told
item.description: A group of Sudanese medics says the latest attack on el-Fasher is a war crime.

item.title: ID photos of 70,000 users may have been leaked, Discord says
item.description: The platform says hackers targeted a firm that helped to verify the ages of its users.

item.title: Half a million bees killed in Dutch arson attack
item.description: Police investigate after 10 beehives were burned down in a park in the central city of Almere.

item.title: Fireworks and a toast to life: Israelis delight at deal to return hostages
item.description: "I can't quite believe this is actually happening, we've been waiting for so long," said Gil Dickman, cousin of hostage Carmel Gat.
